lead_paragraph: A group has asked the country’s highest court to swiftly resolve the case of Oskar Gröning, a former SS soldier whose conviction over complicity in the murder of 300,000 is under appeal.

headline.print_headline: Survivors of Auschwitz Seek Action in Nazi Case
headline.main: Auschwitz Survivors, in Their 90s, Urge Germany to Act on War Crimes Case

snippet: A group has asked the country’s highest court to swiftly resolve the case of Oskar Gröning, a former SS soldier whose conviction over complicity in the murder of 300,000 is under appeal....
abstract: Auschwitz concentration camp survivors ask Germany's Federal Court of Justice to expedite appeal in case of former SS soldier Oskar Groning, who was convicted for his role in murder of prisoners; representatives of survivors note elderly plaintiffs have little time left to see justice served.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
